sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function AssetRow({ asset, index }) { const formatPercentage = (value) => { const isPositive = value >= 0 return ( {isPositive ? '↑' : '↓'} {Math.abs(value).toFixed(2)}% ) } return ( {index + 1}
{asset.name}
{asset.symbol}
${asset.price.toLocaleString()} {formatPercentage(asset['1h'])} {formatPercentage(asset['24h'])} {formatPercentage(asset['7d'])} ${asset.marketCap} ${asset.volume24h} {asset.circulating} {asset.maxSupply} the ) }
